name: Dragon tears
description: Tears taken from the acient dragons of the great montains, those give to you stamina.

name: Red potion
description: A simple red potion, the ingredients are common quest rewards, those give you health points.

name: Black oak stick
description: This stick has a pure dark color, light is complety absorbed by those. Breake in two to make instant fire

name: Stick of truth
description: This rod makes whoever has it inside tell the truth
